Sophomore guard Jaylen Nowell shoots a jumper against UCLA PERIOD Nowell became the forty-first UW player to reach  points in the UWs game against Cal PERIOD

Sophomore Jaylen Nowell surpassed the 1000point mark this evening in Berkeley Calif. on a transition three in Washingtons loss to Cal PERIOD

The milestone gives the Huskies their fourth active player to reach that mark joining Noah Dickerson David Crisp and Matisse Thybulle in the exclusive club PERIOD This is the first time in school history that the Dawgs have had four players all with at least  career points PERIOD

The Garfield graduate is the forty-first player in school history to put up at least  career points PERIOD Nowell was the lone holdover from the starstudded recruiting class that former head coach Lorenzo Romar had before being fired and the rest of the recruits decommitting shortly thereafter PERIOD His scoring ability was instantly on display putting up  points in his first game on Montlake against Belmont a careerhigh to this day PERIOD

This season Nowell leads the Huskies with . per game PERIOD
